page.title: 19Woman's Rural Institute
page.content: The{Scottish Women's Rural Institute} meets once a month to provide Social, educational and recreational oppotunites for its forty-three members and to foster interest in country life and home industry. President {Mrs M. Grundison Treasurer {Mrs E. Christie Comp. Sec {Mrs N. Fraser Secretary {Mrs H. Smith Press Secretary {Mrs M. Easson Raffle Secretary{Mrs A. Tait Committee {Mrs F. Jeffrey, Mrs {J. Lemmon, Mrs A. Boney. {The Wednesday Club}is a club for{ {senior citizens}which meets once a fortnight. Chairman{Mrs A. Murray. The {Youth club}run by{Mr Stewart}for young people between 11 and 18 meets on Friday evenings. The{Karate Club}run by{Mr R. Kane}(3rd Dan) meets on Saturdays. There are ten members.
